price: Abbaa kiyyaaf araarami, inni jallattoota irraa ta’eera.
arabic: وَٱغۡفِرۡ لِأَبِيٓ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-igh'fir li-abī innahu kāna mina al-ḍālīna
